title: Five
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR10L
description: This simple story about a comforting family tradition will familiarize students with the high-frequency word five. Small repetitive sentences support the early emergent reader. The accompanying illustrations are warm and colorful, and each page has a hidden number five for students to find. In addition to working on decoding skills, students will also have the opportunity to study main idea and details and plural nouns.
highFrequencyWords: Guided Reading Lesson PDF
awareness: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
phonics: Blend Onset and Rime                : Blend onset and rime sounds
wordWork: Plural Nouns                : Recognize and use plural nouns
